title: Siofra's Nightmare
description: Eight months after her fairytale wedding, half-breed, telepathic werewolf is having erotic dreams, starring a tall blonde, pointy-eared man and not her husband Conall. When a man she thought was only myth appears, claiming to be trying to protect her, Siofra is thrown into a world of evil magic and lust. When her dreams become real, Siofra has to make a heart wrenching decision to rid her Pack of this evil presence trying to engulf it.
author: Theresa Marguerite Hewitt
